晳字的基本解释

晳
xī
同“晰”。

晳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xī］
［《廣韻》先擊切，入錫，心。］
(1)本作“晳”。指人肤色白。
(2)泛指白色。
(3)同“晰”。清楚；明白。
(4)明亮貌。参见“晳晳”。
(5)不能结实的枣树。

晳字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　晳； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页496第37
【正韻】思積切，音析。【五經文字】晳从白。相承多从日，非。【正韻】曾點字晳，本从白，《論》《孟》《史記》皆譌从日。今不可改，故收入。【正字通】按从白者爲白色之皙。从日者爲明辨之晳。二字義各異也。

晳字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
晳字的起名意思

同“晰”。

Basic explanation of words
Clear
xī
Same as "clearness."
Clear
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xī］
["Guangyun" first strikes and cuts, enters the tin, and the heart. ]
(1) This is "Clarity". Refers to people with white skin.
(2) Refers to white in general.
(3) Same as "clearness". Clear; understand.
(4) Bright appearance. See "Clearness".
(5) Jujube trees that cannot bear fruit.
Clear

[Zheng Yun] Zeng's words are clear, the original is from white, "On", "Meng" and "Historical Records" are all from the day. It cannot be changed today, so income. [Zhengzitong] According to the white one, it is the white one. The one from Japan is the clarity of distinction. The two characters have different meanings.
